column3: A special thanks to Dom for being a resource in regards to weaponry and guns.

Blue lines hovered in his vision, extending from his chest to point at nearby sources of metal, a result of his Allomancy.

Nails holding together buildings, spent shell casings lying scattered in the dust, or horseshoes piled at the silent smithy—all were as motionless as the old hand pump planted in the ground to his right.
